name: Ext_R5_PlanDefinition_ac_trigger
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.PlanDefinition.action.trigger for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents PlanDefinition.action.trigger from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PlanDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: When the action should be triggered
element.definition: A description of when the action should be triggered. When multiple triggers are specified on an action, any triggering event invokes the action.
element.comment: `PlanDefinition.action.trigger` maps to R4 `PlanDefinition.action.trigger`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
